title: Abiky
author: Abiky
content: I have one of these posters lying around collecting dust. I'd say the condition of the poster is FAIR, because it has a few dents from storage. There are some white paint marks on the back of the poster too, as I've tried to cover brown/yellow spots.   (click each thumbnail to enlarge)Before I make an auction or sales thread, I want to know if there's interest in this poster. Otherwise, I'll keep it. Shipping only to US addresses at the moment. Thanks for looking.

comments.author: YodasRedRocket
comments.body: I would likely throw a bid on it.  Thanks!

comments.author: Fattcatt
comments.body: Do you have the matching number other version poster too?       Pink I

comments.author: Lesbian Cow
comments.body: Have you considered an auction?  There seems to be good interest, myself included.

comments.author: Abiky
comments.body: Quote from: Lesbian Cow on June 01, 2022, 07:12:48 PMHave you considered an auction?  There seems to be good interest, myself included.Yes. I will be creating an auction thread shortly. Thanks everyone for your interest.
